Use the latest innovation in image discovery from Shutterstock. Search the Shutterstock collection by using your camera or photo library to find visually similar matches in look & feel. Point, shoot, and discover.

We want to give you the best experience possible with this app - If you have suggestions, feature requests or want to report an issue, write us at support@shutterstock.com or visit the More section in the app to contact us.

See stunning search results with no cropping with our unique Mosaic grid layout.
Discover even more search results with our new sliding search bar.

Search our collection using Siri - just ask Siri to “Search for pictures of dogs on Shutterstock” and instantly see great results.
Start a search directly from the app icon with our new quick action menus.

Now have the ability to exclude keywords when doing searches through the app. And as usual a round of minor bug fixes and enhancements.
Now have the ability to exclude keywords when doing searches through the app. And as usual a round of minor bug fixes and enhancements.

Good news!

If you have iOS 11, you can now drag and drop images within the app. It’s an easy way to search for similar images or add an image you love to your image collections.

Even better — on an iPad, ​you can now drag your Shutterstock images into any editing app that supports it.

Plus, we’ve made some general improvements and bug fixes.

With a simplified, sleeker design, it’s now even easier to explore and download millions of our stunning images.

See the difference for yourself.

We want to give you the best experience possible with this app - If you have suggestions, feature requests or want to report an issue, write us at support@shutterstock.com or visit the More section in the app to contact us.

Improvements to the image detail page: There is now a single, scrollable view for easy navigation, and the artist/contributor information is more prominent so that it’s simpler to find.

More browsing features: You can now browse by similar image, similar model, or related keywords, and add images to a Collection.

To improve the creative experience, Shutterstock Editor functionality is now available only on desktop. This will enable users to access the full capabilities of the tool.

Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

We want to give you the best experience possible with this app - If you have suggestions, feature requests or want to report an issue, write us at support@shutterstock.com or visit the More section in the app to contact us.

We are very excited to announce our first Augmented Reality (AR) powered mobile viewing experience for our customers. The latest update includes a new “View in Room” button that allows users to access their camera phone and virtually position any of Shutterstock’s 250 million images against the wall in a room of their choosing.

We want to give you the best experience possible with this app - If you have suggestions, feature requests or want to report an issue, write us at support@shutterstock.com or visit the More section in the app to contact us.

You can now search, view, and license royalty-free videos directly on your iOS devices with the Shutterstock app. Try it now!
